001100 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000 //andi $0, $0, 0  ---- $0 = 0
001000 00000 00000 00000 00000 001010 //addi $0, $0, 10 ---- $0 = 10
000000 00000 00001 00010 00000 100000 //add $2, $0, $1  ---- $2 = 10 (if no switches are on)
001000 00001 00011 00000 00000 010100 //addi $3, $1, 20  ---- $3 = 20 (if no switches are on)
